channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Konstantinos Pouchias
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Konstantinos Pouchias

item.title: Project 1: Coursera Data Science Capstone Project
item.description: Taking the role of a data scientist working for a new rocket company Space Y, that would like to compete with SpaceX, I had to predict whether the first stage of Falcon 9 Rocket will land successfully. The following data analysis procedures were used for this project: 1)Data Collection ( Using the SpaceX API and webcraping) 2)Data Wrangling 3)EDA with SQL and Data Visualization(MatplotLib) 4)Interactive Visual Analytics ( Data Visualization wiht folium and building a Dashboard with Ploty Dash)

item.title: Project 2: Rent Price Prediction
item.description: Rent Price Prediction in Thessaloniki Greece In this project I tried to predict the rent price of an apartment located in Thessaloniki Greece, as well as determine which is the best model I can use for that purpose. This repository contains two files with code. 1. Webscraping I created a Python script in VS Code, to help me aqcuire the Data from a real estate page, and then I saved them as a csv file.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My love for science and my desire to solve problems led me to choose mechanical engineering as my field studies. My studies in Engineering helped me to further sharpen my problem-solving skills and ultimately taught me a way to approach and deal with any challenges that may arise in my life. During my studies, I became passionate about applied mathematics, statistics, mathematical optimization, and programming. My greatest achievement by far is my thesis project.
